description.value:
Cracks and healed fractures spiderweb the shaft of this bone wand, worsening each time the wand is used. The bone's worn epiphysis forms the wand's pommel, and black leather wraps around the handle.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enfeeble]{Ray of Enfeeblement}. After you cast the spell, if the target is enfeebled, it releases a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] that doesn't include itself. Each creature in that area must attempt a Fortitude save as if struck by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enfeeble]{Ray of Enfeeblement} but gets an outcome one degree of success better than it rolled.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enfeeble]{Ray of Enfeeblement}.
